::Slayer::

Slayer looks behind him, watching the three followers getting cliser.
He sees them aim, and sharply pulls up as the shots leave their
weapons. Weaponfire passes by inches under him, but none hits him as
he flies up, turning sharply and now flying back the way he came, the
three Preds and him facing away from each other at the moment.

"And run is exactly what I'm planning to do," Slayer replies to the
shout quietly, more to himself than to the Preds, since they
probably wouldn't be able to hear him anyways. Now flying back toward
the destroyed trainer base, he adjusts his course a bit, heading
south.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> lUZBEL/ KALI/ ATTILA::
>
> the three bot increased hteir speed too and soon were behind
Slayer. > Luzbel and attilla fired 25 times and kali fired 2
missiles. the > three bots tried to force Slayer let go of Ignatius.
>
> "You can run, but not hide " shouted Luzbel
